Text: Casey Jr. Splash 'n' Soak Station:  Casey Jr is the train seen in the film "Dumbo", where Dumbo, his mother, Mrs. Jumbo, and other circus animals travel on to the shows.
Triplets:<Casey Jr
4:
--------------------
<Text: Casey Jr. Splash 'n' Soak Station:  It is designed to look like it has actual animals in the train by having elephant trunks and giraffes that spray out water at young guests.>
Triplets:<Casey Jr. Splash 'n' Soak Station
